contentList.content: Curved wood and strings of gold, a treasure to behold. Fingertips on frets alight, awaken day or starry night. Sweet notes dance and gracefully soar, through halls and chambers, evermore. A tapestry of sound so fine, the lute's melody, truly divine.

You gain <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> Skills, and have <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency</LSTag> in, and <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on, Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Perform a medley of songs to inspire and fortify your allies.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

Each turn, restore [2].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [3].
